text.en: The foundation of all qualities is the gracious guru;
text.en-trans: yönten kün gyi zhir gyur drinchen jé

text.en: And to rely upon him or her correctly is the root of the path.
text.en-trans: tsulzhin tenpa lam gyi tsawa ru

text.en: Inspire us to understand this well and rouse our energies,
text.en-trans: lekpar tong né bepa duma yi

text.en: So that we may follow with the greatest respect!
text.en-trans: güpa chenpö tenpar jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us so that we may realize how this excellent support,
text.en-trans: len chik nyepé dalwé ten zang di

text.en: With its once-found freedoms, is so rare and momentous;
text.en-trans: shintu nyé ka dön ché shé gyur né

text.en: And let us always be determined, day and night,
text.en-trans: nyintsen küntu nyingpo lenpé lo

text.en: To make the most of this precious opportunity!
text.en-trans: gyünché mepar kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Let us remember that life and limb are as transient and ephemeral
text.en-trans: lü sok yowa chu yi chubur zhin

text.en: As bubbles in water: death, the destroyer, approaches swiftly;
text.en-trans: nyurdu jikpé chiwa drenpa dang

text.en: And after death the results of positive and negative actions
text.en-trans: shiwé jesu lü dang dribma zhin

text.en: Will accompany us, just as a shadow follows the body.
text.en-trans: karnak lé dré chizhin drangwa la

text.en: Inspire us so that we may gain firm conviction in this,
text.en-trans: ngepa tenpo nyé né nyepé tsok

text.en: And remain always conscientious:
text.en-trans: tra zhing trawa nam kyang pongwa dang

text.en: Avoiding even the slightest harmful actions,
text.en-trans: gé tsok tadak drubpar jepa la

text.en: While cultivating every form of virtue!
text.en-trans: taktu bak dang denpar jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us to see the shortcomings of mundane pleasures,
text.en-trans: chepé mi ngom dukngal kün gyi go

text.en: Which only disappoint, lead to every form of suffering
text.en-trans: yiten mi rung sipé püntsok kyi

text.en: And cannot be relied upon;
text.en-trans: nyemik rik né tarwé dewa la

text.en: Instead let us enthusiastically pursue the bliss of liberation!
text.en-trans: dönnyer chenpo kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us so that, motivated by this pure intention,
text.en-trans: nam dak sampa dé yi drangpa yi

text.en: With mindfulness, vigilance and conscientiousness,
text.en-trans: dren dang shezhin bakyö chenpo yi

text.en: We may take to heart thepratimokṣavows,
text.en-trans: tenpé tsawa sosor tarwa la

text.en: Which are the very root of the teachings.
text.en-trans: drubpa nyingpor jepar jingyi lob

text.en: Just as we have fallen into the ocean of existence,
text.en-trans: rangnyi si tsor lhungwa jizhin du

text.en: All other beings, our very own past mothers, have too—
text.en-trans: mar gyur drowa kün kyang dedrawar

text.en: Inspire us to see this and to master supreme bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: tong né drowa drolwé khur khyerwé

text.en: And to take responsibility for liberating all beings.
text.en-trans: changchub sem chok jongpar jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us to see that even if we develop the intention,
text.en-trans: semtsam kyé kyang tsultrim nam sum la

text.en: Unless we train in the three types of ethical discipline,
text.en-trans: gompamé na changchub mi drubpar

text.en: We will not attain awakening, and thus to apply ourselves
text.en-trans: lekpar tong né gyalsé dompa la

text.en: With great energy to upholding the bodhisattva vows.
text.en-trans: tsönpa drakpö lobpar jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us to calm distraction towards the erroneous,
text.en-trans: lokpé yul la yengpa zhijé ching

text.en: And to enquire correctly into the genuine nature,
text.en-trans: yangdak dön la tsulzhin chöpa yi

text.en: So that we may swiftly generate within our minds
text.en-trans: zhiné lhaktong zung du drelwé lam

text.en: The path that perfectly unites tranquility and insight.
text.en-trans: nyurdu gyü la kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us, so that having trained in the common path
text.en-trans: tünmong lam jang nö du gyurpa na

text.en: And become suitable vessels, we may easily set out
text.en-trans: tekpa kün gyi chokgyur dorjé tek

text.en: On the sublime approach of fortunate individuals
text.en-trans: kalzang kyewö jukngok dampa der

text.en: And enter the Vajrayāna, supreme among vehicles.
text.en-trans: delak nyi du jukpar jingyi lob

text.en: At that time, inspire us with unfeigned certainty
text.en-trans: detsé ngödrub nam nyi drubpé zhi

text.en: In the teaching that pure vows and commitment
text.en-trans: namdak damtsik dompar sungpa la

text.en: Are the basis for attaining two types ofsiddhi,
text.en-trans: chöma minpé ngepa nyé gyur né

text.en: And let us guard them even at the risk of our lives.
text.en-trans: sok dang dö té sungwar jingyi lob

text.en: Then, inspire us, so that having realized they key points
text.en-trans: dené gyüdé nyingpo rim nyi kyi

text.en: Of the two stages, which are the essence of the tantras,
text.en-trans: né nam jizhin tok né tsönpa yi

text.en: We may never waver from the yoga of the four sessions
text.en-trans: tün zhi naljor chö lé mi yelwar

text.en: And practise according to the noble guru's instructions.
text.en-trans: dampé sung zhin drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: Thus, may you inspire us with your blessings,
text.en-trans: detar lamzang tönpé shenyen dang

text.en: So that the spiritual guides who reveal the excellent path
text.en-trans: tsulzhin drubpé drok nam zhabten ching

text.en: And companions who practise authentically may live long,
text.en-trans: chi dang nang gi bardu chöpé tsok

text.en: And all outer and inner obstacles may be fully pacified!
text.en-trans: nyewar zhiwar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: In all our lives, may we never be separated from genuine gurus,
text.en-trans: kyewa küntu yangdak lama dang

text.en: May we enjoy the splendour of the Dharma,
text.en-trans: dralmé chö kyi pal la longchö ching

text.en: And by perfecting the qualities of the paths and stages,
text.en-trans: sa dang lam gyi yönten rabdzok né

text.en: May we swiftly attain the level of Vajradhara!
text.en-trans: dorjé chang gi gopang nyur tob shok
